DOC.detailed_description: The Decompressive Craniectomy In MALignant middle cerebral artery infarction ( DECIMAL ) trial prospective , multicenter , randomize , open ( single blind evaluation primary outcome measure ) control study efficacy decompressive craniectomy plus standard medical therapy compare standard medical therapy alone patient malignant middle cerebral artery infarction . The study protocol approve regional ethic committee ( CCPPRB Hospital SAINT LOUIS , PARIS ) . The study conduct 13 stroke center France fund French Ministry Health `` ASSISTANCE PUBLIQUE- HOPITAUX DE PARIS '' . An independent Data Safety Monitoring Board ( DSMB ) monitor safety , progress ethic trial . The aim trial determine patient malignant middle cerebral artery infarction well clinical outcome early decompressive surgery compare standard medical therapy alone . Secondary objective determine clinical MRI base prognostic factor well outcome decompressive surgery .
